scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Families of Flatbush portrait album dates from circa 1870 to 1890 and contains 36 items. The album consists of cabinet card portraits of individuals from well-known families from the Flatbush neighborhood of Brooklyn, including the Brown, Martense, Lott, Hunter, Prince, and Vanderveer families. Individuals are identified on each page of the volume, and a name index is available on the first page. Two related cartes-de-visite are also included with the album.
